# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly a game-changer and offers unparalleled value in its category. Given its exceptional quality and features, it's worth more than $12000 to us. However, considering your unique needs and the benefits this product can bring to you, we're offering it at an exclusive price of $10000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a highly competitive rate. Don't hesitate to seize this chance to elevate your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
